author: charles
msg: TLS docs updated and converted to html.

author: serge
msg: Major changes is the separation of mailet API.  Interfaces defined in org.apache.mailet, and Avalon/JAMES implementation handled by org.apache.james.core and other classes in various packages (as appropriate).

Longer term, the mailet API will hopefully be contained in a separate JAR and the source code for this jar moved to a separate part of the CVS tree.  For the moment, the build.xml compiles all code into one jar.

author: charles
msg: Replace items attribute, which is no longer suported by Ant, with includes

author: charles
msg: Distinguished between a MailRepository, which is essentially permanent, and a spool repository, which is essentially transitory. Amended James.java, JamesSpoolManager and conf.xml. This makes it easier to have, say, a file-system spool but user mailboxes in an RDBMS.
